title: BLT Wedge Salad
directions: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, cook bacon until crisp. Transfer bacon to a paper towel-lined plate and set aside.
Meanwhile, make dressing: In a medium jar, add sour cream, mayonnaise, buttermilk, ranch seasoning, chives, 1/2 tsp salt, and Â¼ tsp black pepper. Shake well. Keep in fridge until ready to serve.
Serve iceberg wedge with drizzle of ranch dressing, tomatoes, and bacon, and garnish with chives.
ingredients: 1 tbsp. minced chives, plus more for garnish
1 large head iceberg lettuce, cored and cut into 4 wedges
